metadata.title: CVE-2013-1582 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The dissect_clnp function in epan/dissectors/packet-clnp.c in the CLNPdissector in Wireshark 1.6.x before 1.6.13 and 1.8.x before 1.8.5 does notproperly manage an offset variable, which allows remote attackers to causea denial of service (infinite loop or application crash) via a malformedpacket.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1582` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 1.10.6-1
libwireshark3 - 1.10.6-1
libwiretap3 - 1.10.6-1
libwsutil3 - 1.10.6-1
tshark - 1.10.6-1
wireshark - 1.10.6-1
wireshark-common - 1.10.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.6-1').
